docs: Configuration for IK/SO QC and UI. See the 'so.docs' block for how force thresholds work.

so.docs:
Thresholds:
- Exactly ONE of these per metric:
  * RMS: force_rms_max [N] | force_rms_max_pcGRF [% of component GRF RMS in SLS] | force_rms_max_pcBW [% of BW in N]
  * MAX: force_max_max [N] | force_max_max_pcGRF [% of component GRF MAX in SLS] | force_max_max_pcBW [% of BW in N]
- Mapping: SO.FX vs FP.y, SO.FY vs FP.z, SO.FZ vs FP.x; absolute values are used.
- Bodyweight: BW = meta.PROCESSING.Bodymass * 9.81 [N].
- so_ms_tol: milliseconds trimmed at start and end of SLS window.
